org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop

Class HadoopClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.HadoopClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ClassCache

    public class HadoopClassLoader
extends URLClassLoader
implements ClassCache
    Class loader allowing explicitly load classes without delegation to parent class loader. Also supports class parsing for finding dependencies which contain transitive dependencies unavailable for parent.

      • loadByCurrentClassloader

        public static boolean loadByCurrentClassloader(String clsName)
        Check whether file must be loaded with current class loader, or normal delegation model should be used.

        Override is only necessary for Ignite classes which have direct or transitive dependencies on Hadoop classes. These are all classes from "org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl" package, and these are several well-know classes from "org.apache.ignite.hadoop" package.

        Parameters:
        clsName - Class name.
        Returns:
        Whether class must be loaded by current classloader without delegation.

      • hadoopUrls

        public static Collection<URL> hadoopUrls()
                                  throws IgniteCheckedException
        Returns:
        Collection of jar URLs.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
